title: Support implementation of Case Management in Magenta Force (successor of O3-based IRRP processes)
description:
Description
Process information:
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2299931865
Requirement:
(MAGBUS-95669) (Sequence Diagram)
Implement eMail interface to Magenta Force in November 2024, Matthias Johannes Hoffmann (Architektur), Jürgen Brummer
Analysis and Design with Magenta Force in PI26, Armin Steinmetz
Feedback Magenta Force, 28.08.2024:
Switch of the current IRRP mail interface to Magenta Force, Go-Live: 01.11.2024:
possibly non or small development effort for O3
Only "register" to the new mailbox
Test support in October 2024
Conversion to API:
Start of implementation in Magenta Force September/October 2024:
Analysis and design effort 
first talks with Armin have taken place
Joint implementation in the 1st or 2nd Q 2025
